evidence.claim: FluidEdge utilizes AWS and Azure cloud services for scalable infrastructure.
The company offers healthcare integration solutions compliant with HIPAA and FHIR standards.
FluidEdge employs Snowflake for data warehousing and analytics in health tech projects.
They leverage HL7 standards for healthcare data interoperability solutions.
The organization integrates EDI transactions, including X12, into their offerings for healthcare clients.

icp.icp_reason: FluidEdge specializes in healthcare integrations, demonstrating use of HIPAA and X12 standards.
